page.title: 07FAMOUS PERSON, NAILSWORTH
page.content: {Kit Williams'}early life was in Kent but he now lives in Horsley.He is an excellent artist and is now famous for his paintings which illustrate his two books{"Masquerade"}and {" The Bee {on the Comb."}He first wrote and illustrated {"Masquerade"}which has some of his most famous paintings inside.The task in {"Masquerade"}was to follow clues given in the book to find a golden hare which had previously been buried. {Kit}thought it would be found in about 2 weeks but it actually took 2 years.In his book now known as {"The Bee on the Comb" the task set was to follow clues which would lead to the book's title.The prize,a golden bee.At school Kit knew he could paint but never took it seriously until he was older.
